name: Dandy Stool in Shagreen w/Bronze-Patina Brass
description: The dandy stool inlaid in shagreen is a chic seating piece for any space. The sides of the pieces are completely inlaid in bronze-patina brass adding another luxurious element to the piece. The clean lines make it an adaptable piece and the discreet bronze-patina brass indentation details add another luxurious element. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks. Design SKU reference KSTL04. Available in a variety of finishes.
